info: 星海偶遇-莫白_主流程文本II

content: As our planet grows, there'll be more space, so you'll be able to invite <style=Highlight>more Neighbors</style> to live here together!
info: 星海偶遇-莫白_主流程文本II

content: {A灵光一现}I'm glad to hear that, hoho~! After all, that's part of the fun of traveling! Fate will always bring lucky souls together out in the Starsea.
info: 星海偶遇-莫白_主流程文本II

content: {A害羞挠头}Because... hoho~! That's part of what traveling is all about! Fate will always bring lucky souls together out in the Starsea.
info: 星海偶遇-莫白_主流程文本II

content: Once you've exchanged contact info, you can <style=Highlight>call them from Starcove</style> and invite them over for a visit.
info: 星海偶遇-莫白_主流程文本II

content: {A抱歉}Welcome back, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! Did you meet anyone new on your first voyage?
info: 星海偶遇-莫白_主流程文本II
星海偶遇-莫白_主流程文本II

content: {A抱歉}We'll also get ready to welcome the next new Neighbor with you. If you need anything, feel free to talk to me at the Camp, hoho~!
info: 星海偶遇-莫白_主流程文本II

content: {A笑哈哈}Chat, exchange gifts, invite visits... As your <style=Highlight>bond deepens</style>, you'll be able to invite them to settle here as a new Neighbor.
info: 星海偶遇-莫白_主流程文本II
